prompt: Design a feedback form with a bold monochrome theme, featuring a white background and black accents. Display a 'Feedback' title at the top in a large, sans-serif font. Include a concise subtitle below in gray. Arrange elements in a vertical layout: a name text field with black borders, an email field with validation, a dropdown for feedback type (Bug, Feature, General, Support) with black styling, a multi-line text area for comments with a light gray fill, and a 5-star rating system with black stars aligned to the left. Place a 'Submit' button at the bottom with a black background and white text. Use sharp corners, minimal shadows, and tight spacing for a clean, stark design.
